event_patrol.description: [wwise]The idle sound to trigger when the enemy is patrolling.

event_investigate.description: [wwise]The idle sound to trigger when the enemy is investigating.

event_combat.description: [wwise]The idle sound to trigger when the enemy is in combat.

cooldown_moving_patrol.description: The length of the VO idle event cooldown when the enemy is moving.

cooldown_moving_investigate.description: The length of the VO idle event cooldown when the enemy is moving.

cooldown_moving_combat_min.description: The length of the VO idle event cooldown when the enemy is moving.

cooldown_moving_combat_max.description: The length of the VO idle event cooldown when the enemy is moving.

cooldown_moving_combat_min_distance.description: At this distance or lower, the cooldown value will be clamped to minimum default.

cooldown_moving_combat_max_distance.description: At this distance or higher, the cooldown value will be clamped to maximum default.

cooldown_standing.description: The length of the VO idle event cooldown when the enemy is standing still.

cooldown_standing_combat.description: The length of the VO idle event cooldown when the enemy is standing still in combat.

cooldown_randomization.description: How much should the VO idle event cooldown be randomized.

cooldown_area_range.description: If a VO idle event happens, within what range should the cooldown be reset

cooldown_id.description: Cooldowns of creatures with the same cooldown ID are shared. Max 96
